description:
http://anidb.net/ch142873 [Otogi Morihito]`s family is descended from a long line of ogre familiars, and he has the inhuman strength to prove it. One day, his father comes to him with the life-changing news that he is to become the familiar of his childhood friend, the teenage witch http://anidb.net/ch142875 [Nico]. He is to live under the same roof with her and protect her from anything and anyone that may attempt to harm her. Meanwhile, Nico is excited to get to live with the love of her life, even if her crush is one-sided—Morihito is so serious about his duties to protect her that any romance is going to be an uphill battle. But he has every reason to be serious, as Nico has a prophecy of doom hanging over her head!
Source: Viz
Note: The first two episodes received an early screening at a special event on 30 March 2025 at Shinjuku Piccadilly in Tokyo. The regular TV broadcast started on 6 April 2025.

REGULAR.description:
Morihito Otogi is a teenager with ogre strength. His childhood friend, Nico, is coming home after completing her witch training! Following an old pact, they begin living together. Nico`s very excited to be reunited with Morihito and her heart won`t stop pounding. Along with the "clumsy" Nico bringing in a whirlwind of inescapable, fantastical magical troubles, can Morihito protect Nico from a dire prophecy? Nico and Morihito`s magical comedy begins!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Le retour de la sorcière
Majo no Kikan
Powrót czarownicy
Witch`s Return
魔女の帰還

REGULAR.description:
Nico and Morihito’s living situation filled with "grim prospects" begins, but for Morihito, an even greater challenge awaits him. That`s right, Morihito and Nico both enrolled in Asunaro Private High School. They`re both in the same class, but Morihito pushes Nico to hide the fact that she`s a witch. But when Nico tries to sneakily use magic to save Morihito, she may have accidentally spilled all the beans!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Giant Rookie / Let`s Go to a Diner / The Flying Classroom
Kolosalny pierwszak / Chodźmy coś zjeść / Lewitująca klasa
Oogata Rookie / Famires Iko! / Tobu Kyoushitsu

大型ルーキー / ファミレス行こ! / 飛ぶ教室

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to the easy-going nature of their peers, Nico and Morihito continue their everyday lives as a witch and an ogre. One day on the weekend, when Nico and Morihito are relaxing at home, a package arrives from Nico’s mother, Ibuki. Attached is a letter addressed to Morihito, which had a new prophecy that read, "Dogs and raindrops will bring disaster." Morihito is a little confused but tries to exercise cautious, and then…
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Fresh Transparent Fashions for Spring / Witch`s Delivery Service / Lost Dogs and the Patter of Rain
Haru no See-through Coord / Majo ni Takkyuubin / Maigoinu to Ame no Beat
Printemps et tenue transparente / Une livraison pour la sorcière / Chien errant sous pluie battante
Prześwitujące kreacje na wiosnę / Podniebna poczta Nico / Zagubiony pies i rytm deszczu
春のシースルーコーデ / 魔女に宅急便 / 迷子犬と雨のビート

REGULAR.description:
In order to protect Nico, the crow familiar Kanshi Kazamatsuri appears before Nico and Morihito. Kanshi is a tengu who lived in the mountain where Nico was undergoing training. Like Morihito, Ibuki asks Kanshi to protect Nico, but Kanshi sees the ogre Morihito as an enemy. Despite that, it looks like Kanshi will be moving in with Nico and Morihito?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanshi Kazamatsuri le tengu
Kanshi Kazamatsuri – Tengu
Kanshi Kazamatsuri, the Tengu
Tengu: Kazamatsuri Kanshi
天狗 -風祭監志-

REGULAR.description:
Nico and Morihito’s homeroom teacher, Ms. Makuwa, is a secret manga otaku. Her favorite series is “Uron Mirage,” also known as “U.M.” One day, she hears that one of her students, Kukumi Ureshino, a.k.a. Kuku, has been posting U.M. fanart on her Chitter. It seems like she has 10k followers and some of her art has gone viral. And as Ms. Makuwa predicted…
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Moja uczennica okazała się moja ulubioną rysowniczką / Dziś znów dokucza mi brzuch / Koci rekonesans
Mon artiste favorite dans ma classe / Problèmes intestinaux du jour / Chat-Pardeuse

REGULAR.description:
Nico is in panic mode because Morihito has gotten quite popular at school. Even Kanshi is able to recognize Nico’s feelings for Morihito, but Morihito remains as clueless as ever. However, Nico hears about a famous Lovers’ Tree at Mt. Futatsu, where her class will be going on a field trip soon. According to the rumor, if two people eat lunch together under that tree, they’ll become a couple. Kanshi pressures Nico to tell Morihito about her feelings.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Enmusubi no Ki no Shita de
Pod drzewem zakochanych
Sous l’arbre des promesses d’amour
Under the Lovers` Tree
縁結びの樹の下で

REGULAR.description:
"I heard you can easily make money." With that reason alone, Nico and Kanshi started the "Kan and Nico Channel." Morihito gets irritated about how ignorant Nico and Kanshi are towards creating videos to post online, so he asks their hipster poser classmate, Keigo Magami, for help.
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Kanshi cried as he clung to Morihito. And that`s because Kanshi immediately blew away his allowance and can`t pay the monthly living expenses to the Otogi household. And so, Morihito hands him a flyer for a hero show for hire being held at Akebono Park.
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Nico and Morihito were at their classmate Kara Minami`s house. Kara had invited them over so they could recover Kara`s shredded up letter. Nico tells Kara that in order to use the spell "Witch Recovery," the parts of the item need to be somewhat gathered. Since there were other shredded pieces of paper in the pile, it would be difficult for the spell to succeed. The letter that Kara wanted to have Nico recover is a letter from her departed mother that her father had put in the shredder.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Dear Kara / New Friend / Date with the Knight

伽羅へ / 新しい友達 / デート・ウィズ・ザ・ナイト

REGULAR.description:
Morihito is targeted by the very tropey Student Council. Ibara Ibu, the sexy, older sister Vice President who throws roses. Yuzuru Kenmochi, the other Vice President with a Kansai accent and closed eyes who definitely won`t betray you. The European-style tsundere loli and Japanese-style horror cool-dere twin sister secretaries. The treasurer, who looks like an elementary school student, but is a genius hacker. The musclehead beast P.R. Officer. The psychotic knife-licking crazy General Affairs officer, and also in the same office, a mysterious robot-man. Lastly, the one who stands above them all, the Student Council President who won`t take his hand off his hat, Tenryu Kiyomiya. What will Morihito do?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Betabeta Seitokai / Kayoi Neko no Awai Hitotoki

ベタベタ生徒会 / 通い猫の泡いひととき

REGULAR.description:
Kanshi saves Keigo from getting his sneakers stolen. The person who attacked him used a candy called "Drop," which has a stimulant effect that amplifies one`s strength and desires. They learn that a person named "Wolf" was distributing this candy, and the ones using this candy to go berserk are called "Dogs." Later, a witch named Nemu Miyao appears before Nico and Morihito.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Chien et pluie (Première partie)
Dogs and Raindrops, Part 1
Inu to Uteki: Zenpen
Psy i krople deszczu: część 1
犬と雨滴・前編

REGULAR.description:
When he sees the shape of a crescent moon, he changes into a fierce werewolf with a ferocious amount of wild strength. He isolates and attacks Morihito. Meanwhile, Kanshi and Nico are surrounded by Wolf`s "Dogs." They devise a simple plan where Nico searches for the witch who is targeting her, so Kanshi can attack the witch.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Chien et pluie (Second partie)
Dogs and Raindrops, Part 2
Inu to Uteki: Kouhen
Psy i krople deszczu: część 2
犬と雨滴・後編

REGULAR.description:
After things have calmed down, Keigo Magami has moved into the Otogi household. According to Keigo, he`ll transform into Wolf if he sees any "crescent-shaped objects." Wolf gives in to his greed and will sleep and eat all day if he can, and even with his sexual desires… And so, Nico, Morihito, Kanshi, and Keigo remove all crescent-shaped objects to lessen the risk of transformation.
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Utsuro, Oboro, Sagiri, and Zack have arrived at a building that was used to research something.
Source: Crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
"Visit the ancient retainer that exorcises evil." Nico`s mother, Ibuki, has delivered a new prophecy. Ibuki has an idea who this "ancient retainer" could be, and tells Nico and her familiars to visit them. They were a bit of a ways away, so Nico, Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Nemu head to the lands where this ancient retainer lives with a summer vacation feeling.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Letni demon
Natsu no Mamono
Summer Demon
Un démon en été
夏の魔物

REGULAR.description:
The vampire Miharu Kiryu has moved into the Otogi household. Because he’s a vampire, he tends to be a nightowl and lazily doesn’t wake up until past noon. On top of that, he needs to siphon life energy to survive, so he immediately gets some from Morihito after waking up. He may not do well in a communal living environment, so will this further power up the chaos in the Otogi house?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyuuketsuki: Kiryuu Miharu / Kasa ga Nai / Aete Ureshii

REGULAR.description:
A strange mask was attached to their faces, and Morihito, Kanshi, Keigo, and Miharu were transported to an unknown room while they were sleeping. The monitor in the room suddenly turns on and says, “My name is Zigzag. Play a game with me.” A strange mask, a deep voice-changed voice, and orders from beyond the monitor. They were trapped in a death game, and Nico was a hostage.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Death Game Idomareta kedo Kusogee Datta  / Long Long a Go Go
Utknęliśmy w śmiertelnej rozgrywce, ale było fatalnie / Long Long a Go Go

REGULAR.description:
Dressed in a miko’s outfit, Nico and Kuku are helping out Kara’s father, who is the head priest at a shrine. While helping out, Nico uses the spell “Ani-snippy” from shide paper, and creates a moving paper cat. Kara also wanted to create a flying bird, but the shape didn’t come out too well and couldn’t take flight. But the shape she cut out was so terrible that it looks like a “shikigami” and ended up creating a life?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kara and Shiki / Mega Marble Mania Madness / Scramble Scrap Squad
Kara i Shiki / Kulkowe szaleństwo / Rysunkowa ekipa
Kara-chan to Shiki / Kyousou no Biidamania / Scramble Scrap Squad
カラちゃんとシキ / 狂騒のビーダマニア / スクランブル・スクラップ・スクワッド

REGULAR.description:
Morihito was cleaning his room, and found a letter that Nico wrote to him when they were children. “To Moi, I will always be your friend.” Morihito had it pinned to the wall for five years and looked at it almost every day and got cheered up by it. It was the death anniversary for Morihito’s mother, so he went to visit her grave. Meanwhile, Nico, Kanshi, Keigo, Miharu, and Nemu who was visiting, were listening to a story of Nico and Morihito’s childhood days.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Letter from a Friend
List od przyjaciela
Tomodachi no Tegami
ともだちの手紙

REGULAR.description:
Keigo can’t use his immense strength unless he looks at a crescent shape. Nico sees that Keigo is sad, so she asks him to become the user for a ring that has “flying magic” sealed inside. If he can come to utilize it, he should be able to wield it as a weapon, so Keigo begins his training. One day, in the middle of training, Nemu visits and talks to him.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Mayoi Ookami to Kayoi Neko
The Lost Wolf and the Stray Cat
Zabłąkany wilk i bezdomny kot
迷い狼と通い猫

REGULAR.description:
Keigo was troubled because the viewers on his channel weren’t increasing. He talks to his roommates Nico, Morihito, Kanshi, and Miharu about it, but he just gets a blunt, “Because it’s not interesting!” In order to liven it up, she asks if she could appear in his channel, but Morihito says no. That’s when Nico comes up with a great idea.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Himitsu no Shoudou / Keiko no Kimama Style / Jekyll no Otogi-ke Houmon
Secret Urges / Keiko`s Carefree Style / Jekyll Visits the Otogi House
Tajne związki / Beztroski styl Keiko / Jekyll odwiedza dom Otogich
秘密の衝動 / ケイコの気ままスタイル / ジキルの乙木家訪問

REGULAR.description:
Nico, Kara, and Morihito are having a donut devouring party in Nico’s room. When something bad happens or whenever you get tired, then you need to eat donuts! Nico thinks that every girl should experience the ever-wonderful candy land world, so she casts a spell to shrink their sizes so they can roll around in donuts!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Niesamowita przygoda z kurczeniem / Jesienny festiwal pieczywa Hamazakiego / Urodziny pod znakiem szczęścia
The Incredible Shrinking Adventure / Hamazaki Aki no Pan Matsuri / Lucky Birthday
The Incredible Shrinking Adventure / The Hamazaki Fall Bread Festival / Lucky Birthday
The Incredible Shrinking Adventure / ハマザキ秋のパンまつり / ラッキーバースデー

REGULAR.description:
Ms. Makuwa and Kuku are hard at work for their “Uron Mirage” dojinshi. Ms. Makuwa is in charge of writing and boarding out the story, but is struggling to complete it to the way she likes. In the meantime, Kuku will practice her art since she has time until the event. Kuku also reveals to Ms. Makuwa that she became friends with someone online who replies to her on Chitter. They were going to have an offline meetup the next day. Sick with worry, Ms. Makuwa decides to secretly follow her to the meetup.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Hajimete no Off Kai / Oshi Eshi Nisshi: Shippatsu Dotou Hen / Oshi Eshi Nisshi: Haran Kaijou Hen
Nasze pierwsze spotkanie offline / Przypływ kreatywności / Cykl szalonych wydarzeń

はじめてのおふかい / オシエシニッシ 執筆怒涛編 / オシエシニッシ 波瀾会場編

REGULAR.description:
“I will finally! Do! The laundry tomorrow!” Morihito declared. It’s been one year since he’s been lovingly wearing his denim jeans, and will now perform a second wash. Morihito has a personality that gets very dedicated to his hobbies, so having heard very long lectures on the topic, Nico and Kanshi try to stay out of it. However, Miharu has never seen Morihito so fired up, and dares to ask him, “Please tell me more about denim.”
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Moi-chan no Denim Dou / Date with the Guide
Moi`s Denim Devotion / Date with the Guide
モイちゃんのデニム道 / デート・ウィズ・ザ・ガイド

REGULAR.description:
It’s almost Asunaro Festival. Nico’s class will be utilizing her magic to run a “haunted café” so you can spend some whimsical time in a cafe full of ghosts. While the class was preparing for the event, Nico was asked by a festival committee member if she could cast some spells during the festival’s opening ceremony. Meanwhile, Kanshi asks Morihito to do a comedy duo on the performance stage.
Source: Crunchyroll
